title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.6 - Assignment to a day placement program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.6 - Assignment to a day placement program

State Regulations
(a) Youth may be assigned to a day placement
program at any time following admission to the division. (b) Prior to assignment to a day placement
program, each eligible youth shall receive a verbal and written explanation of
the program which shall include, at a minimum, a description of: (1)
the program; (2)
the conditions of participation which the
youth must follow; and
(3)
the
grievance process. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
178.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
